department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: a: capital; X-shaped with all four legs of approximately the same length; carved with scrolls and feather fans; teak; b: tapered column with turned elements at top; metal collar at top and bottom; teak with metal; c: base; square bottom with waisted, tapering circular elements with fluted designs; mottled grey, black and white stone
markings: on bottom of capital, on Yorkville Van and Storage sticker: [PIECE NO. / 126]
object_name: Three-part pillar, from a four-piece set
title: Three-part pillar, from a four-piece set
